text: Desislav Slavov Chukolov (Bulgarian: Десислав Славов Чуколов; 22 December 1974 – March 2022) was a Bulgarian politician. He was a member of the Attack Party. He was born in Ruse, Bulgaria. He was elected member of the European Parliament from Bulgaria on 20 May 2007. He left office in 2009. Chukolov died in March 2022, at the age of 47.На 47 г. почина Десислав Чуколов ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Bulgaria
title: Desislav Chukolov
